servers.name: @modelcontextprotocol/server-everything
servers.description: MCP server that exercises all the features of the MCP protocol

tools.name: read_text_file
tools.description: - Read complete contents of a file as text

tools.name: read_media_file
tools.description: - Read an image or audio file

tools.name: read_multiple_files
tools.description: - Read multiple files simultaneously

tools.name: write_file
tools.description: - Create new file or overwrite existing (exercise caution with this)

tools.name: edit_file
tools.description: - Make selective edits using advanced pattern matching and formatting

tools.name: create_directory
tools.description: - Create new directory or ensure it exists

tools.name: list_directory
tools.description: - List directory contents with [FILE] or [DIR] prefixes

tools.name: list_directory_with_sizes
tools.description: - List directory contents with [FILE] or [DIR] prefixes, including file sizes

tools.name: move_file
tools.description: - Move or rename files and directories

tools.name: search_files
tools.description: - Recursively search for files/directories that match or do not match patterns

tools.name: directory_tree
tools.description: - Get recursive JSON tree structure of directory contents

tools.name: get_file_info
tools.description: - Get detailed file/directory metadata

tools.name: list_allowed_directories
tools.description: - List all directories the server is allowed to access

servers.name: @modelcontextprotocol/server-memory
servers.description: MCP server for enabling memory for Claude through a knowledge graph

tools.name: create_entities
tools.description: - Create multiple new entities in the knowledge graph

tools.name: create_relations
tools.description: - Create multiple new relations between entities

tools.name: add_observations
tools.description: - Add new observations to existing entities

tools.name: delete_entities
tools.description: - Remove entities and their relations

tools.name: delete_observations
tools.description: - Remove specific observations from entities

tools.name: delete_relations
tools.description: - Remove specific relations from the graph

tools.name: read_graph
tools.description: - Read the entire knowledge graph

tools.name: search_nodes
tools.description: - Search for nodes based on query

tools.name: open_nodes
tools.description: - Retrieve specific nodes by name

servers.name: @modelcontextprotocol/server-sequential-thinking
servers.description: MCP server for sequential thinking and problem solving
